EmailTemplate.subject: Start using our do-it-yourself VOI tool
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for registering to access our do-it-yourself verification of identity (VOI) tool for property transfers. Now you can start using it to verify your clients' identity.
Your login credentials Username: Password:
How to access the tool Go to the Property VOI portal at https://auspost.com.au/propertyvoi (Refer to 'Help & support' for instructions on how to use it.)
VOI in store at Australia Post If you'd like to give clients the option of having their VOI check completed at participating Post Offices, please print, sign and return a copy of the attached VOI (Property Transfers) Referral Agreement via email to LandTitleVOI@auspost.com.au
Alternately, you can post your signed agreement to:
Property Transfers VOI Reply Paid 4310 Adelaide, SA 5001
Once we've received your signed agreement, you'll be able to generate customised VOI forms for your clients to complete and present at participating Post Offices to have their identity verified.
Access VOI reports You can access reports via the Property VOI portal. You'll find instructions on how to use the report repository here.
Questions? Email us at LandTitleVOI@auspost.com.au or call us on 1300 364 543.
Kind regards,
Australia Post Property VOI Team
